title: [QUESTION] SKGLView in Views.Blazor
body:
Hi 
I have a SKGLView in an razor page (SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor) the page has a SignalR connection and it recieves data and tries to invalidate the SKGLView when data arrives  but OnPaintSurface is not called.
```razor
 <SKGLView Width="512px" Height="512px"  id="radarSkiaA" OnPaintSurface="OnPaintSurface"/>
```

and
from code
```cs
radarSkiaA.Invalidate(); // OnPaintSurface is not called
```
I have the same type of code in a WPF app, where everything works as ecpected.
```razor
 <SKElement  x:Name="BitmapHost" PaintSurface="OnPaintCanvas" />
```
and from code
```cs
 BitmapHost.InvalidateVisual();
```
Any idea?
